content.detailedDescription: On new year 1 minute after midnight four red spheres appear float around then disappear.  50 witnesses. alaska time.  2 went south 2 north they would stop remain stationary then move on slowly. the whole thing lasted 1o-11 minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 4 spheres reddish orange new years appear then slowly move around the disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was watering lawm in front of my home, i have a clear view of the sky and it was a perfect cloudless day. at about a 45 degree angle moving from east to west i see a silent slow moving ridged metalic looking boat just floating across the sky. oddly enough it didnt surprise me nor scare me. without a shadow of a doubt in my mind this was not a blimp, balloon, military or civillian craft. it was like a floating black boat? needless to say it was the most strange thing i have ever seen. since then ive constantly look up in the sky and have seen additional bizare craft but none like this.
content.summary: Slow movimg metalic boat looking triangle. no sound, no vapor trail. moved right in front of me. saw perfect details

content.detailedDescription:
On 12-28-2009 at around 11:40. the day had been overcast, but as the night approached the clouds gave way to partial clearing and you could see some stars. i was sweeping snow from my front walk and driveway when out of the corner of my eye i saw what i thought was a formation of geese(not knowing if geese fly at night) i turned to look and realized i was looking at a inverted "v" shaped object maybe the size of three commerical jets. the object was illuminated by beautiful amber colored lights spaced evenly around two sides of the inverted "v". the object was cruising lower than any plane i had ever seen and there was no sound coming from the object other than a wisp of air being displaced. i realized the object must of flown unnoticed almost directly above me as it was on a southeastern course. i watched the object for about 25 seconds before it did disappear into a cloud. i watched for about five minutes more, but i did not see it again.
the inverted "v" was not a solid triangle shape, the back of it seemed to have 90 degree fins which also had the amber lights, but i am not absolutely positive about this.
i immediately told my mother what i saw and the next day my uncle. my uncle ask me if it could have been a sleath bomber, but i have seen the sleath and the answer is no. i have told no one else for fear of being thought crazy and thought long and hard in telling mufon! 

thank you for your time,

james bronowicz
content.summary: 12-28-2009: inverted v shaped illuminated object witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother blane were looking at the moon when we see these strange lights in the sky.When we observed the lights closer up wae noticed the shape of the ufo.It was a triangular black ufo.It was slightly more black than the sky.The sky looked to be a dark purple.We are at the address of 1081 cave springs rd.We are down a hidden driveway.There is a pasture to the side of our driveway.When i first notised it i thiught it was a plane but i examined it closer and saw the black outline with four lights on the bottom. there were three yellow lights and one red lightin the middle.The ufo had strange flight patterns.It was fast one moment, slow another,and then it started going down.It disappeared below the trees and turned around and flew back behind ur house and just dis appeared.Honestly when i first recognized it as a ufo i was really scared.I didn't know what to do.All i could do is sit there and stare into space.
content.summary: Triangular four lighted ufo.It had three lights on each point and one smaller red light  in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
An invisible black ufo with white head near the cloud. this picture was taken on 3feb2009, after nine days it  appeared again.
please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Black ufo picture

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of the 30th i was continuing an evening photo session i had been conducting over the previous 2 nights.My subject was not ufo's,my camera is samsung compact 10.2 megapixel which i have set on superfine.This night i set the camera to the dim light setting placed it on a high stool to hold it steady while pointing slighly upward i took 4 photo's over a 12 second period and stopped as the flash did not work on this setting.As i was deleting the blank photo's the third had an image of an object lighting up the cloud base the fourth photo was blank.
  i was facing north at the time weather was cloudy, cloud base approx 4000ft no stars visable, i didn,t see the object as i was not looking up ward only the camera caught it in seconds.I submit the photo for your examination for there is more to see upon enlargement.As well as the main bright object there 2 other dimmer on the same trajectory and something poking through the cloud upper left of the object.
   what did i think brilliant as at various times over the last 40yrs i,ve seen ufo's 4 times but never captured one on camera.
content.summary: Caught on camera

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling via expressjet from houston iah to louisville kentucky for business. facing the plane, i sat on the right side of the plane just ahead of the wing next to the window. once we reached cruising altitude, i started reading a book.I became increasingly bored and looked outside my window. i noticed a sphere about the size of a compact car approximately 200 feet off the wing of the plane.

it was dull in color. an unpolished metal nearly exact in the image of a very large ball bearing, it was perfect in it's spherical shape. always looking for a logical, scientific explanation to anything paranormal first,i assumed it was a tiny bubble in the glass of the window or ice on the glass of the window. i studied it for about a minute and was astonished when i witnessed it move behind a small cloud.

i immediately looked down the aisle and noticed many other passengers were looking outside the window at the object as well. i looked at the object again and noticed it never swayed, dove or maneuvered at all. it was very static in it's position. this made me skeptical. how can any craft fly alongside another craft and never move, in any manner from it's present position? anything in flight is always fighting the physics of the atmosphere every second i.E. barometric pressure, wind, air pockets, friction, etc... 

i looked for an explanation. maybe some strange tether to a weather balloon or refraction of light on the window? there was no physical explanation. it was what it was. my mind raced as i tried to understand how something so non-aerodynamic could possibly create lift. i looked for some sort of glow or exhaust or any type of radiation to explain it's terrestrial origin. nothing. it sat at one position with no presence of any mechanical movement. it appeared as if it was observing us, though there were no visual ports or windows. 

i didn't take my eyes off of the object as i knew i was witnessing something extraordinary and oddly beautiful. i, for the first time in my life was truly in awe. we traveled into a thick cloud formation. i witnessed the sphere pass through a patch of thick cloud and never resurface. as soon as it appeared it was gone. 

here is where things got weird. i looked down the aisle to hopefully catch eye contact with someone who was witnessing this event and could discuss this. what i witnessed next shook me to my core. all other witnesses, approximately 20 plus, just leaned back into their seats and continued reading their books, newspapers and laptops as if nothing happened. why was i the only person who felt as if i just witnessed a magnificent moment? whether it was a higher intelligence or something we created, it was a beautiful moment. 

i reflected on this for several minutes up to the final hour of our flight. once we reached our terminal,i had totally forgotten the entire experience. how could this happen? how could i forget an experience that shook my entire core and being? several years later i started to slowly recall my experience. why did the other passengers not even have any sign of expression on their face after the incident? why did i totally forget the entire experience until many years later?
content.summary: Large sphere traveling alongside plane approximately 200 feet from wing of plane.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was looking at the moon through a telescope on the patio, (it was the blue moon and we had observed the partial eclipse earlier in the evening). i was in the house when he called me. his eye had been caught by a large orange/red disc in the sky. it was moving from north to south over our house. i didn't arrive quickly enough but then another object, identical to the first, appeared. i saw the orange/red disc like object travelling silently across the sky towards the south. 
initially we thought it was a meteor about to break through the atmosphere but it was much too large and the height was difficult to determine as it was a very clear night. the second object when i saw it was about a quarter the size of the full moon and became redder in colour as it moved. it continued southward, to the west of cork airport, over the sea until it faded from sight. it did not burn out, as a meteor might. it did not appear to drop in altitude as a falling object would. it had no navigation lights but moved at sort of helicopter speed (faster than a satellite would and much larger anyway.)
our 2 younger children 15 and 10 also saw this object.
we are sure it was not a man-made object due to the silence of the movement. neither of us have ever thought much about ufos before as my younger son said it was definitely unidentified and flying! so it was a ufo!
content.summary: 2 objects flew over house. 1 followed the other

content.detailedDescription:
We saw 3 different objects tonight (1/2/2010) on i-20 north of stephenville, tx. i caught two of them on video. 

my family was traveling eastbound on i-20 on the evening of 1/2/2010. it was approximately 7:40 when i noticed a very bright object towards the south. i kept traveling east bound and watching the object at our 1:00 position. it was producing red, green, and white lights and was pulsating. i told my wife to look out the window and watch this light.  as we continued down the road the object moved towards our 2:00 position. after watching it for five or so minutes my wife decided she didn't know what it was and nor did i. i decided at this time to pull over at a rest stop at exit 390. my wife kept an eye on the object and it was now at our 3:00 position. we stopped the car near the entry of the rest stop. my still camera and video camera were packed in the back so i jumped out. as i got out of the car my wife said that it disappeared, but she was able to get a great visual of this object. i was disappointed, but for some reason i still scanned the skies and as i looked towards my 11:00 (northerly) i saw an object coming straight overhead. it had red and green lights on the tips and a white light in the middle. i waited a second because i thought it was an airplane that might be headed in the direction of the light we saw, but as it came closer i saw that it was a triangular craft.  it was flying between 200-300 ft.  i immediately jumped to the back of my car and grabbed my still camera and took two shots- one without the flash and one with. the object went directly over my head. the best shape i can describe it as is the shape of your typical triangle highlighter. the edges were very rounded. the tips of each end was a light. one side was solid green and the other side solid red. the front was a solid white. the white light was not very bright and i could see the contours of all the lights very clearly. it was not your typical bulb lights, but a solid and smooth light that was actually the ends of the triangle. each corner of the triangle was a contoured light.  however, the white light in the front of the craft did not cover the entire nose. i did not hear a single engine sound out of the object. the highway could not have drowned out any normal aircraft since it was not that high. the object absolutely displayed it's lights like a normal airplane to anyone casually looking, but i was able to get such a good look at it there is no way it was anything "known."

i checked my still camera and the pictures were horrible. i then scrambled to retrieve my mini-hd sony camcorder out of the back of the van. by the time i got to it the object was just over the small tree line out of my site. i jumped back in and drove up to the exit of the rest stop. i jumped back out and walked south (which would be my 3:00 position originally). i stopped near the access road and was still able to get some footage of the craft which now looked like a pulsating light. i've posted all the videos i shot of this object here. you can view them in hd, but they don't compare to the object as it flew over me.
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gvxq5sb8kyo
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=5jh3pbodueq
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ie80_goc2kw 

i was still kicking myself because i didn't pull out the video camera first so i decided to see if i could head back west and catch up to the object since it was not moving that fast. i drove approximately 3 miles west on the access round south of i-20 and then turned south towards stephenville. i was 1 mile south of i-20 when i stopped and got back out of the car. it was very dark since the moon was just starting to come up. i looked west, but could not see the object any longer. as i looked around i saw the moon rising and i then noticed another flashing light south of me. this starlike object was moving very slowly at first heading in a north east direction. it quickly picked up speed. a tree line was blocking my view, but it's trajectory should have allowed it to come through the other side of the tree line. it never did. that video is posted here:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=7ncyxfurbe0
content.summary: Triangle ufo over i-20, exit 390, observed less than 300ft high

content.detailedDescription: In feb. 1989, i lived in waldorf md. grew up there, i was driving over to my mothers house to take her to the store i was driving down a backroad , nearing the stop sign on acton lane, off in the distance was a very strange looking object in the sky, it was moving in a very strange pattern, it would move to the right very fast then to the left very fast then straight up and then back, it continued to do this for about 7 minutes i did not know what this thing was so i just went on to my mothers house which was about a mile.I picked her up and started driving her to the store, i backed out and pulled to the stop sign by her house and there was the same object  up close now flying right above the tree tops and moving very slow.This object was very large, it was about the size of a football field, it was sort of oval shaped, metallic in color, it had no windows, no lights,around the center had lipped edges thats how close the object was to us, it made no sound, and the strangest thing about this object is it had like a black tube looking thing coming from the bottom center about half the lenght of the object, for some reason i felt as if it was searching for something.And i knew this was not something from our world.Then the following night i go back over to take her to the store again around 10 pm as we are pulling out from the same stop sign we see a lot of lights in the sky fling in a strange pattern that i have never seen before, they were flying at an average speed and we watched them out of sight. now the funny thing is when we got back to her house we were watching the news and the news castors were making jokes about the flying objects or lights flying over andrews airforce base and making jokes about them being ufos.I will never forget this event and it will always be very clear in my mind. i will also send a sketch of what it looked like. i have drawn it so many times.And just to let you know i do not drink or do drugs i am a well respected person. i never reported this because for one i did not know who to report it to, and people just think you are making it up. what i saw that day and the next was very real.I want this to be on record some where, and that someone else knows about it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very large sort of oval shaped metallic object

content.detailedDescription: My husband, my mom, my youngest child and i were traveling east bound on i 80 just outside of mustang when i first noticed a steady stream of red lights travel right in front of our vehicle.  at first it almost resembeled sets of vehicle tail lights but i knew that that was not possible because vehicles do not travel in that direction on that part of the highway and the object was flying extremely fast.  i was the first to notice it and got the attention of the others just in time to see the tail end of it.  i immediately began looking for answers as to what it was but there was no explanation.  we were still in shock when it happened again in the same direction (south heading north).  this time all of us saw it very clearly but still are completely unaware of anyhing that this could be other than a ufo.  the experience of the sighting was amazing.  people will continue to be skeptical about this life form until something like this happens to them.  i admit, i had my doubts, until tonight.  there is not a question in my mind about what i saw.  i saw a ufo.
content.summary: Steady stream of synchronized red lights flew directly in front of my vehicle and continued to travel contouring the mountains.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was at home with my kid and went outside onto the back porch and noticed a very odd out of place object in the sky above the mountains that face the direction of the ocean. the object was still and did not move for about 5 minutes and then suddenly it was gone!
content.summary: At home with my kid,walked outside to look at the mountains and there it was

content.detailedDescription: I went out to do a sky watch at 6:40 and only four mins in i seen first object real low coming from south,go north,then ne.Just after that one another one  came from nw to se moving very slow.All together i seen,and filmed about 6 different object that were coming after one another.I m attaching the 35 mins of video so may not upload but it should.
content.summary: Multiple ufos from 6:45-7:20

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was like a star shape bright light it came from the south going north to north east.I live near a small airport hoffmans avaiation.There was three small planes in the area and this ufo came right inbetween all of them,there is no way for the pilots to mis the ufo it came close to all of them, i have a big flash light and shined my light on it while it was in between all the planes not to mention the jets that were flying at a high altitude, then the ufo took off to the east and the more it went the faster it got til it dimmed out way out to the east,,im outside sky watching, im out almost eerynight and lately since its been colder out the ufos been coming down closer to roof tops.This ufo went slow, i dont have a video camera but ive been seeing alot of ufos above my house
content.summary: Saw it come from the south of me going north east

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a triangle flashing multicolored object that appeared suddenly in the northeastern clear sky over lake erie on 12-26-09 at approx. 9 pm. hovered silently then moved slowly over the lake heading west. stopped again over head and vanished.

 this occured while i was laying on our boat pier the night after christmas watching the stars on a super clear calm night. i was talking to a friend on the phone who later helped me recall the details i described to him and the length of time it took place.  i remember nervously joking on the phone with him as it was happening that i was all alone in an isolated place and what if they just decided to "beam me up", that was when it slowed to a stop for the second time directly over head paused for a second or two and then vanished.  i made a half joking comment to him about wondering if they were listening in to our phone conversation before taking off.

 it lasted only a few min.  but the occurrence was so amazing because there was almost no wind blowing on the beach and the lake was super calm, yet the object did not have any sound like the rest of the planes that i was watching that night flying over the lake.

 there was a lot of air traffic in the sky being the day after christmas and this was coming from an odd angle and in the opposite direction of the other planes. also it did not continually move at times or have the right color lights or right blinking sequence of lights like a regular aircraft.  plus the shape was a triangle with no apparent row of lights along the widest bottom part. it looked flat black and was solid so as to block out any stars it passes over.

 i was lying very still for over 15 mins. on the pier just enjoying the beautiful clear night's sky before it first caught my attention in the corner of my eye.  i just continued to lay there in amazment while describing it to my friend on the phone. he told me to take a picture but i figured that by the time i brought up the app on my iphone it would be gone and i figured the phone wouldn't get a decent picture in the middle of the black night sky with no flash. plus i was kind of shocked and could only watch and tell my friend what i was seeing  i might have tried if i had my regular digital camera with me but it all seemed to happen so  fast, i just couldn't take my eyes off of it while it was happening.

it was so distinct, i'm sure i wasn't the only person to see such a strange sighting over the lake. i don't know if this had anything to do with anything, but right after it disapeared, clouds rolled in and a dense blanket of fog rolled onto shore from the north off the lake. the temp dropped sharply with the fog appearance and the rolling cloud cover although it had been crystal clear for the 3 hours i had spent there.
content.summary: Appeared over lake hovered moved slowly hovered then disapeared in a blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to pick up some friends from purdy around 6pm and something made me look at the sky, then do a double take. the next day i remember i saw a quick flash of a big ship in the sky and it disappeared, but at the time i dont remember seeing anything.

on our way back across the narrows bridge, i noticed a small light, about star size, was following us. at first i thought it could have been a satellite or a plane. we drove to the nearest public library and parked, and noticed that the light was still following us. this made us kind of concerned and curious, so we followed it to the tacoma waterfront. 

across the water, just above the horizon, was a bright light, pulsating different colors, and hovering for 30 min about....Then, all of the sudden, there was a second light that appeared next to it, pulsating the same colors, at the same rate. 

now i know that there is an airport around the same area, but i know planes dont just hover.

we watched it for over an hour, and they would go away from each other, then would come closer. my friends at the time (i dont talk to them anymore for other reasons) wanted to go home so i took them home and came back and the lights were still there.

then i noticed that there were little white flashing lights coming out of them, like little white strobe lights. 

then the light that appeared, kinda flickered out, and disappeared. soon after the other light did the same

it was late so i decided to go home.

i did have this on tape, but it was later destroyed because other things were on the tape that people didnt like.

after seeing this, i knew for sure what i saw wasnt conventional aircraft.

i've seen other things like this before, and im sure it wont be the last.

i know maury island is somewhere around there as well
content.summary: Strange lights shooting out other lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying from tampa, fl to pgh,pa our flight took off at 620pm.  about an hour into the flight my 18 mo. old started flipping out...So my husband got up and started to walk her in the aisle.  out of embarrassment i started to stare out of the window.  i noticed a series of orange lights that were pulsating in a sequence.  at 1st i thought it was christmas lights or an airport.  it started in a foresty area and at 1st i thought it was much smaller than it was.  but the lights started to go over highways and malls and then i realized that the size of the lights were about the size of a car.  there were five of them and they stayed in the same formation.  i guess the craft was invisible because i didn't see anything but lights.  every once in a while in addition to the five lights i would see a line of lights that kinda looked like this ..................
it almost looked like as it was skimming over the ground that it was like a surge of energy would brighten up as it traveled.  i watched this go on for about 10 minutes. it traveled parallel to the flight path but was nearly on the ground and i was however high up commercial airplanes fly.  it wasn't scary, i'm not scared now.  i'm not even sure it was anything.  the only reason why i am reporting this is because i mentioned this to my friend who i just left in florida that we got in okay told her about it and she told me to report it. several times i looked away from the lights and told my husband what i saw seeing and he thought i was crazy.  but every time i looked back i could see it again.  it went away simply with no warning just the lights stopped pulsating and i guess it was gone.  (note in the about when i mention where this happened...I don't know where exactly this happened but in order for me to report anything, i had to put something in there but i have no clue where it was. i am just estimating)
content.summary: While in an airplane i saw orange lights with invisible craft skimmimg above ground

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were watching fireworks from my wifes and my bedroom window. a few minutes went by when we saw what looked like an airplane coming from the east at an incredible speed. as it got closer it stoped on a dime and hovered in the air maybe one mile from our house. from the looks of it it was disc shaped with lights going all around it. they didnt look at all normal, the entire ship...Or object looked to be on fire. after hovering for what seemed two or three seconds it shot to the nort then stopped on a dime while it  hovered again. five seconds went by then at light speeds it vanished. three seconds went by then another one came and did the exact same thing the one before did then vanished. after that one left three seconds later we saw the exact thing happed again. i know this all sounds crazy but it happened. my wife got curious and got online and typed in ufo sightings..Springhill. the 10th of this month a neighbor of ours sighted the exact same thing. if anybody can explain what this is and why this keeps happening in my neighbor, id appreciate it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It looked like it was on fire. definately a disc very large and extremely fast.

content.detailedDescription: My mom and sister were driving across the bridge on browns bridge rd. in gainesville when my sister says to my mom "look mom theres a jack in the sky, my mom sees this to. she slows down to watch as it slowly glides across the night sky and when she gets to the other side of the bridge the trees get in the way of sight. she never saw it again. upon ariving home both my mom and sister were very excited to tell me about the accurance, my mom still has the same story today it has never changed.
content.summary: Looked like a jackstone... you know like the game jacks. like six balls connected together

content.detailedDescription: I was on the  new bridge on the south causewas heading  east towards the beach side,( the bridge is very high about 200 - 300 feet above the intercoastal waterway ) i was on the upward climb towards the top of the bridge when i noticed the cloud. the cloud appeared to be between 500 and 1000 feet up in the air. (from the bottom of the cloud. i saw no aircraft in the air at the time.) it appeared to be at least a mile  or more in lingth and was headed towards the inlet between new smyrna beach and port orange fl.  it was long and rectangular, which was  sloaped towards the top,the top appeared to be flat in my openion, and tenderals of what i can only discribe as (smoke) or clouds that seemed to be reabsorbed by the cloud. the tendrals were being pulled back up into the cloud itself. it appeared to be wavy, gray and dark lines of clouds all going in one direction the whole lingth of the cloud. i have never seen a cloud like it before or since. i first noticed the cloud when i started up the incline of the bridge.It literally filled my view through the windshield of my van. you could not miss it. at first i thought it was just a cloud but when i got further up the ramp at the top of the bridge you could see the whole cloud and could not but wonder why it appeared as it did. the cloud appeared to be traveling in a north northeast direction and you could not miss it.Discribe my feelings-- i was astonished, and had a very uneasy feeling. i was in a hurry for an appointment, and  could not stop to obsurve the cloud. and i am not sure i really wanted to stop and watch it anyway. it was rather scary. i just continued on down the other side of the bridge and to my appointment. it was almost as if something  did not want me to stop anyway.  there was lots of traffic that day but i think i only saw one vhecial on the east side of the bridge (headed west) that appeared to be stopped to watch the cloud.
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: While on my way over to the beach side at new snyrna i spotted a cloud that was like none i have ever seen before or since.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a holiday in prague, czech republic. i was walking in the city and tsakin some photos. i haven't noticed anything in the sky at the time. only when i looked back at the photos i did to me it looks like a a hat that is upside-down but i'm not sure/ it's definitely not a bird or a plane that i know of. i was aastounded but the found.
content.summary: A hat-like shape in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a holiday in prague, czech republic. i was walking on the charles bridge and taking random photos of the city.I didn't notice anything at the time. only when i looked back at the photos, i've noticed something strange.
i knew it couldn't be a bird or a plane because it was pretty big and very flat. i was amazed when i had discovered it. quite shocked as well. since i haven't noticed anything in the sky at the time, i just walked away. what i know for sure is this. this is not a bird or a plane but a real ufo.
content.summary: A disk in the morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
(i have been very interested in learning the truth about ufos and metaphysics all though out my life. until recently i have never seen a ufo but this is what i saw)

i was driving to fred meyers (which is a grocery store in my area)
the weather was dark mild rain storm was going on; but strangely there were some pockets of clear spots. i park my car, at the store. the other people around me were rushing into the fred meyers to hide from the rain and cold, cars where driving past me as well. there was a high feeling of stress area) i saw a flash of white light more in a searching pattern. the ship flew over the fred meyer store and i only i saw the ship clearly for a around 10 seconds it was thin and shape was like cigar, the color of the ship was black i believe; or a very dark color on the ends of the ship there was very bright white "search lights" that were scanning the air. there was a around 5-7 red circle glowing light. (maybe port holes?) it moved very lowing though the air. (i was in shock when i saw the ufo but i could easy move. i kept looking around at the ship and the other people around me and no one else seem to see and even care about looking up. the ship moved into the clouds and i lost clear slight of the ship but the white search lights were still easy seen. the ufo flew out of the parking area and i was soaking wet at the time so i went into store. while i was trying to finish my shopping i felt a strong wave feeling past though me and for a second i thought i might loose my balance. no one else seems to notice the wave feeling either.
(i have been reading and watching many books and videos about this subject but learning how the ships work is very difficult to find. but i have believed more in the info from the federation of light and they say that their ships can only be seen by people that have higher spiritual energy. or when they choose to lower there energy (but my gut is leaning more to the whole nazi american ufo theory about the ship that i saw. because i felt no spiritual upliftment the search light look more human but more powerful then any air plane light that i seen ) i'm a buddhist, and see a lot of what the federation of light speaks about connecting with a lot what i believe in.
    but i also don't know if it just bs. i have been having strange dreams (where i am talking and learning things from people but i cant remember enough to make sense of it. i have seen what i believed were sprits. sense the age of five but when you get in the whole federation of light theory in connects aliens with spiritual expericances and it makes a lot of sense. the only problem is can you trust the source of the information?)
content.summary: Cigar shape ship 5-7 red circle lights/ white search lights at the ends

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting watching tv and seen 2 orange lights in the distance as i have my blinds slightly opened. they looked strange and was alerted immediately my partner also bounced out his seat and we both gazed in amazement and could not figure out what they were.

there were two lights orange in colour moving away from the hose at an angle.

then i was immediately alerted as two round balls of fire floated over the building, a guesstimate they were 500 - 1000ft in the air they moved off quickly and then the two of them looked as if they merged into 1 then disappeared. then in the distance which i caught on video for about 23secs came in from the west direction and was moving erratically in a side ward motion. it quickly disappeared. wee stood and looked out the window for another 10 mins when 3 aeroplanes... definitely aeroplanes as i could tell with the flashing lights on the wings flew at speed to where i seen the last object...This is the bit that has really startled me...What were the planes looking for ? pretty freaked out about this now as i have never seen anything of the likes before.
content.summary: Orange balls of fire with airplanes chasing afterward's

content.detailedDescription:
i was east bound on us 40 between terre haute and brazil late at night. i was with my girl friend at the time. it was a very clear bright cloudless night, one of those where you could see very well without lights.
 we were just passing the wagon wheel resturaunt when i noticed a stopped car up ahead across the divided highway. i think it was a station wagon. the driver was outside the car standing in the road facing south. as i said it was a very bright night. i slowed down and wondered aloud what was he doing and what was he looking at.
  i looked up and out of the windshield and saw nothing, but when i looked south out of the passenger window i saw a circle in the sky.I stopped the car a block or so west of the other car and got out myself and stood in the road beside my car and looked at the circle.
  when first seen it was about 30 degrees above the horizon and almost straight south. it was moving north by north east at a steady pace. as it got closer i could see a ring of white cloud that seemed to have a dark ring inside the vapor. the vapor seemed to rise from the bottom of the ring and move around the structure along a vertical axis. none of it trailed away, but it did look to move.
  the object passed overhead at a slight angle to the east of me and moved off to the north. it moved from horizon to horizon in a minute or two at most.
  my girl friend was scared and screaming for me to get in the car and leave. i made no attempt to contact the other observer.
  several years later the other fellow wrote down his sighting for a local newspaper artical on ufo sightings.
  at the time i was a 23 year old vietnam veteran who had just finished a tour with the army air defense command at a missle site in florida.
content.summary: A quick moving smoke ring

content.detailedDescription: While watching tv; i saw saw a very low and large glowing red/orange light out of the corner of my eye. i grabbed my cousin and we watched it move from west to east.  at times it glowed very bright then dim again. no other lights were on it.  we watched if for approx 4-5 min. on at least two occasions it looked as if it stopped in mid air.  we took note of the time and returned to our movie (both a bit amazed by what we had just seen). approx. 6-7 min later we saw a second cylinder just like the first; but much closer to our home.  we do live close to the airport, and have scene thousands of planes, but this was close enough that we could distinguish that this was not a plane.  again it was a low, red/orange glowing cylinder moving east to west.  this time we ran outside and watched it for approx. 8 minutes.  neither one of us had ever scene anything like this and we have lived by the airport for many years.  we were both quite stunned and began to call the local tv stations; but there were no other reports at this time.  we were then given a number to call and directed to this website.  if anyone else saw this we would be glad to hear about it.  thank you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red/orange glowing cylinder

content.detailedDescription: Noticed 3 silvery spherical objects just south of stigler oklahoma (i was traveling north towards stigler about 4 miles out).  pulled over to side of road and noticed seven similar objects on the east side of street and one large object that appeared to be cloud like.  absolutely no clouds in sky at that time, the large object was moving slowly while the other seven stayed in the same formation with only slight movements.  the cloud-like object pivoted back and forth and rotated to the left and right but the shape never changed.  we watched the large object move to the south for about 10 minutes and i took three pictures with my camera phone.  i made a video of the pics and posted to youtube at: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=mnhu8gpqmca.
content.summary: About seven silvery spheres in formation with one large object (cloud shaped) to the south of the formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work as usual. when i came upon the stop sign, i saw a glimmer of light on my back glass. there were no cars around. so i didn't think nothing of it. as i pulled onto the next road, i noticed the light was still there. i stopped and got out the car to look and see if maybe there was something on the car. that's when i saw the object above me in the sky. it was diamond in shape and the lights were so beautiful and colorful. the lights were all on the outside and the exact same lights were inward torward the center of it(the same shape). i tried to take a picture of it on my cell phone, but it wouldn't show up on my phone. i got back in my car and continued down hwy 269. it was flying really low, and got out in front of me, so now i could see it as i was driving. it was almost like it was following me. i started flashing my headlights at it and it flashed back at me with lights so bright that i could hardly see. as headlights from another car was coming, the object shot off straight up so fast, it was gone in an instant.
to tell you the truth, it was kind of scary. but at the same time, it was very cool. i, myself, am glad to see that there are others out there. and more communications with them would be great.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Early morning scare

content.detailedDescription: To understand what happened at like 2:30 am on i believe late friday night or early saturday morning u have to understand what happened to me in 1989. i was renting a 2 bedroom condo in north dallas. i had a roommate, carole. also who stayed in the bedroom directly across the living room area from my bedroom. i was walking out of my bedroom around like 1 pm and i turned my eyes to the right as i was going through the doorway and i hear this " pop " sound and i see three tiny(maybe like 3 or 4 inches in diamater) greyish-metallic spheres fly right through the wall !!!!....I have like 21/10 vision up close and i was maybe like 2 feet away so i could see them so clearly. they were also flying in an elliptical pattern and i could see that the " popping " sound was them literally expanding and contracting the wall as they went through it !!..I could even see that " doppler effect " colors kind of pooling on the surface of the spheres..My roommate carole was coming out of her room too ans saw something but she was like over 10 ft away at least....I only saw them for less than a second and they were gone so they must have been going very fast...Ok now fast forward to the present. i was in my bathroom and brushing my teeth...After taking a shower....And i hear that " pop " sound again coming from the other room in the living room area which i have converted to my bedroom too and the bedroom i use as like a storage area kind of and that's where the barhroom is....So, anyway that night or the next night(i am not sure) i was walking out of my bathroom into my living room/bedroom area and i see these two perfect symmetrical cirles on my carpet in front of my bed !!!...They look like " crop circles " and one even has what looks like a star map inside it and they are very close to the same diameter of the spheres i saw in 1989 !!!..I wasn't going to report it then i remembered that crop circles can have radiation left behind and i am wondering if these are emitting some kind of toxic radiation.....Could u plesse come and use a geiger counter to check them out.......I have enclosed photos  thanks cici leah campbell
content.summary: Tiny greyish metallic spheres may have come through my wall again..

content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure why i never reported this, but i will do so now.

i believe it was around 1998 in the early fall, maybe september (might have even been 1999.  i am judging this about the relative grade level i was in school at the time).  i was driving with a friend from the minneapolis-st. paul area to rochester, mn along highway 52 with his step-father on a sunday evening before dusk (maybe 5:30 - 7pm).  it was not yet dark out, but it was not 100% light still.  objects outside could still be made out though very well. 

i was enjoying some peace and quiet on the car journey by looking out the window and thinking.  looking out the window of the car, i all of a sudden saw a fairly large dark triangular shape flying above the car.  it was either black or dark gray in color (since it was dusk out, i couldn't tell you the exact color other than it was dark -- near black in color).  if i had to guess where we were, we were probably between cannon falls and hampton in minnesota along highway 52, driving south.

the craft was flying west southwest (a small angle south of what is the west horizontal line), or at least that direction in relation to the heading we were going on the highway.  since highway 52 is almost always south-north, i can only assume west southwest was the direction it was heading.

if i had to guess at the altitude of the craft, i would say it was 150-250 feet above us.  it made no noise and i know this because the radio in the car was not on at the time, and nobody was talking.  whatever noise it made was masked by the white noise of the car driving on the highway.  i believe we were traveling at around 65 mph.  the craft was easily noticeable because of its size, how high it was above us, and how it made no noise.

the craft was fairly large in size.  i would guess the height (triangle wise -- geometry) was 300 feet and possibly larger.  on each of the vertex of the triangle was a differently colored light.  i remember one was red, another was green, and don't remember about the third and they were blinking slowly.  the craft was seemingly gliding and was going no more than 100 to 150 miles per hour.  i think also, not sure, but if memory serves me correctly the craft could have been very slowly rotating.  after it was over us, i asked "what was that!?"  my friend, i believe, was a little scared and brought up something to divert attention away from what just happened.  i am not sure if he saw it or just wanted some peace and quiet and to get home safely.

i continued to watch the object until it vanished into the horizon and i couldn't make it out anymore (probably 45 to 60 seconds after it was above us).  my feelings were one of awe, because i am an aviation enthusiast and had never seen anything like this before.



let me say this:  i am an aircraft enthusiast (especially civil aviation) and can name the make and model of most aircraft flying 500-1000 feet altitude usually.  i believe in ufos and aliens, however i am very skeptical of 90% of the footage i see because of what i know about aviation.  what i saw this evening though was unlike anything i'd ever seen before.  first of all, i've never heard of an airplane that makes almost no noise.  this was not a b-2 bomber either as a b-2 bomber (1) wouldn't be flying in this area, (2) b-2 bomber's shape is not 100% triangular like this objects was, and (3) this object was much, much larger than a b-2 bomber.  the "length" of a b-2 bomber is only 70 feet and again, this objects was probably close to 300 feet.

also, the area we were traveling on i know very, very well.  i grew up in rochester, mn and have traveled that road at almost all times of the day probably 200 or more times in my life.  rochester is located around 50 miles south of where we were at the time of the sighting. to say i don't know the area i was in would be an understatement.  first of all, the area where we were had no structures around it.  it was farm land.  not many people live in the area.  there is a small regional airport about 20 miles northwest of where my sighting was (airlake airport in lakeville, mn).  the craft i saw, however, was heading a little south.  even if that is the direction of approach of aircraft into this airport, i have a few problems with it.  (1)  considering the size of this aircraft, there's no way it could have landed on this airport's only runway given this airport runway's length if it was a regular airplane.  (2)  we were 15 miles southeast of this airport and the craft was 150-250 feet high.  i don't know of any planes that would land at a regional airport, 15 miles outside on approach at 150-250 feet in altitude.  (3) i have never seen any aircraft in this area in my life at this altitude.  the only aircraft i ever saw at this altitude was maybe a few years before, it was probably 2000 feet high and easily a small turbo prop such as a cessna.  the only aircraft in the area i ever see are close to coates, mn which is 10 miles north of where we were because of a small regional airport in south st. paul about 5-10 miles north of coates.  however, this is very rare and the only large aircraft i see are north of the south st. paul airport and they are from the minneapolis-st. paul international airport, which is a good 25-30 miles northwest of my sighting.  i know of no military bases in the direction of travel this craft was heading.  the area it was tracing was one of very low population.  the only "city" it would have intersected in its direction of travel would have been mankato, mn which is a good 65-75 miles away.  the area is literally farm country and not many towns exist in the area.  any of them which do are very small in size and population.
content.summary: Black triangle 150-250 feet above me
